name: Riddle Labs
description:
This is the riddle labs, a place with mind-bending experiments.
Get rid of each riddle in order to pass through the test chambers.
How many tests you can overcome without using any hints?
Uncover your superior mind with these tricky puzzles!
publishers: ROTATELAB YAZILIM VE BILISIM TEKNOLOJILERI SANAYI TICARET ANONIM SIRKETI
